snippet: “Argo” continued its awards-season winning streak at the British Academy Film Awards in London on Sunday.
abstract: Ben Affleck movie Argo wins best film and best director at British Academy Film Awards in London.
lead_paragraph: “Argo” continued its awards-season winning streak at the British Academy Film Awards in London on Sunday.

headline.main: 2 Top British Awards Go to Affleck’s ‘Argo’
headline.print_headline: 2 Top British Awards Go to Affleck’s ‘Argo’
